file_content.text: My brother and I will always remember what you did for us.
You saved my brother's life.
Not only that--you did it with style! Where did you learn to fight like that?
Spend enough time in cantinas, you learn things.
You mean dirty?
You certainly took the crease out of Xin's robes.
It's all in the reflexes.
I'm self-taught.
Drat. I was hoping you could give me some pointers.
A little here, a little there. Mostly I make things up as I go.
Lots of different places.
I had no idea you could be so violent. In retrospect, our celebration was quite gentle.
Ah, so you're classically trained.
Are you going to pay me extra for answers?
What's it to you?
I'm behaving like an awestruck boy, aren't I?
There are no words to express our gratitude. This reward will have to suffice.
You could kiss my wounds and make them better.
That's all, sweetheart?
I would happily oblige, if our circumstances permitted.
What can I say--I love my work.
You're welcome.
Let's hope we never have need of your services again.
It's fine.
The immediate danger has passed, but it's not over yet.
I saved your brother's life. That's gotta be worth more than a few credits.
Make it a big one.
I can't put a price on my brother's life, but I believe I can approximate yours.
My brother and I must flee House Organa. It's only a matter of time before House Baliss makes another move against us.
Nobody will mess with you as long as I'm around.
I'll keep you safe.
You've faced enough danger already. We can afford to hide someplace very safe, thanks to you.
Why don't you come with me? It's probably safer.
There's extra room on my ship.
For us, but not for you. I'm sorry, but it's better if we go.
Alderaan is our home. We must stay and restore our family's honor.
I'm ready to not be here.
Yes, it's time we parted ways.
Here is your payment, bonus included. Goodbye, Captain.
I think you'll find this reward meets your needs. Farewell, Captain.
I hope this reward serves you well, Captain. Goodbye.
Captain, we will always remember you as our champion. Farewell.
Don't underestimate your opponent.
Thank the stars! We're in desperate need and you're the only one we can turn to.
Everything was fine when I left.
What's wrong?
I'm afraid events have quickly turned against us in your absence.
Do I know you?
Cedonia and Lenn Teraan. Are you receiving a clear transmission?
There's, um, a lot of static on this end.
Uh, yeah, that's the problem.
I'll boost our signal. I hope you haven't left Alderaan....
The people with the droid. Sorry, I have a short memory.
Oh, right.
How gratifying to know I'm so easily forgotten....
So much for prevailing upon your sentimentality....
What can I say? You nobles all look alike.
I sort of remember you.
I told you this was a bad idea, Lenn....
Then you're out of luck.
How can you say that, after we...
Please, this is a matter of life-and-death.
Duke Baliss was offended by your visit to our former home. He's demanding satisfaction.
The duke is sending his son, Xin Baliss--Alderaan's finest marksman--to challenge me to a pistol duel to the death.
Isn't House Organa protecting you?
I thought you were safe.
The Organas think we deliberately sabotaged their peace-making efforts by attacking House Baliss. They're refusing to intervene.
So?
This is rather embarrassing given our past history, but... would you consider fighting on my behalf?
Because you're someone accustomed to danger, and er... I'm not.
It was nice knowing you.
Good luck with that.
I don't suppose you'd be willing to prevent such a dire outcome? For old time's sake?
Our friendship doesn't have to end. You could--I don't know--offer to fight for me. Doesn't that sound friendly?
My brother never mastered the art of the blaster. He can't possibly face Xin.
Unless we find a champion to take Lenn's place, he's as good as dead. Please, will you be our champion?
Just how good is Xin?
What am I up against?
He's fought twenty-five duels to the death. In each one, he fired a single shot.
Maybe he just got lucky. You could break his winning streak.
My talents don't come cheap, your lordfulness.
For the right price.
Keeping my handsome face free of blaster holes is worth a lot to me.
Of course I can.
I knew we could count on you.
Fighting duels isn't really my thing.
I can, but I won't.
Ah, I see. Forgive us for wasting your time, then.
Depends on the reward.
We'll reward you well to fight on my brother's behalf.
No.
You're condemning my brother to death. You beast!
It's fine, dear sister. When Xin sees how poorly I shoot, perhaps he'll have mercy and only cripple me.
If you want to stay out of a hover chair, pay me.
I'll save you, for credits.
Done! I enjoy walking.
Nobody cripples my customers. I'm on my way.
Relax, I'll fight Xin for you.
Thank goodness. He would've absolutely slaughtered me.
Please come to House Organa at once. Xin will arrive any moment, and you must be here to meet him.
That's looking on the bright side. Have fun.
You never know. [Refuse]
Xin will be here any moment. Sorry to have bothered you, Captain.
I trust you'll be discreet about our time together.
House Teraan prospers because of your heroism.
Once you recover the historical datapad, we'll be able to pay you as promised.
Proper decorum dictates you address my brother Lenn. He is our house's lord.
Please excuse me. I'm quite busy.
Cut the guilt trip. I'll help.
